pluggable.name: Spamview
pluggable.author: Morgante Pell
The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Provides a dashboard module to quickly see new spam, and a button to delete it.

help.value:
When activated, a dashboard module is created. This dashboard module lists your most recent spam and unapproved comments.

You can optionally enable a button to delete all spam, from the plugin config page. With this option enabled, a button is added to the dashboard module allowing you to instantly delete all spam (but not unapproved comments). A button is also added to the comment management page.

Finally, there is a keyboard shortcut accessible on both the dashboard and comments page. When you press ctrl+d all spam will be deleted.

If you enable the associated option, this same behavior can also be extended to the logs page, allowing you to efficiently clear the logs.
